title: BTS - logged out under age user flow
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user on the home surface
AND user is scrolls down to gaming launcher

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user clicks on 'Play Now!' cta
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user is taken to gaming hub

custom_steps_separated.content: When user clicks on BTS game card
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN 'Please Login or Create Account' modal displays: 
- 'Please Login or Create Account' title
- 'You must login to your account or create a new one to access Beat the Streak. Your will be redirected to the login screen.
'You must be over 21+ years old to play.
- exit icon on the top right corner
- 'Login to MLB App' cta

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user clicks on exit icon
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user is brought back to the gaming hub

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user clicks on 'Login to MLB App' CTA
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN Log In page is displayed

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user enters emails and password (USER IS UNDER 21 YO)
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN user logs in
AND 'Update Account Information' modal is displayed

- title 'Update Account Information'
- copy 'Please update your account information in order to play Beat the Streak.'
- CTA 'Update My Account'

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user clicks on 'Update My Account' button
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user is taken to Additional Information page

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN user enters all required fields
AND clicks 'Update Information' button
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN user is displayed with a modal

- title 'You currently do not meet the age requirements'
- copy 'You must be at least 21 years of age to play Beat the Streak. feel free to participate in our other great MLB Play Games.'
- CTA 'Return to MLB Play'

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user clicks on exit button
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user is taken to the gaming hub

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user clicks on 'Return to MLB Play'
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user is taken to the gaming hub

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user clicks on BTS card again
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user is displayed with 'You currently do not meet the age requirements' modal

title: Validation - Update Account - Additional Information - Nickname
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is on the game hub
AND user has no country of residence

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user clicks on any game
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN 'Please Log In or Create Account' modal is displayed

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user clicks on 'Log In' cta
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user is taken to 'Log In page'

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN user enters email and password
AND clicks Log In
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user is taken to 'Additional Information page'

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN user enters invalid nickname 

NOTE: nickname criteria should be:

nicknames should not be unique must be 6-15 characters long
must contain only letters and numbers
can not contain spaces and special characters
can not contain non-English characters
can not be disruptive or offensive
can not contain emoji
WHEN user enters nickname that is shorter than 6 characters or longer than 15
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN user should see the error message

iOS - Nickname must be 6-15 character long
Android - First we display message - 6-15 Character

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user enters nickname with special character
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user should see the error message 'Nickname mush contain only letters and numbers

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user enters disruptive or offensive nickname
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user should see the error message 'Please choose another nickname'

title: Validation - Update Account - Additional Information - DOB
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is on the game hub
AND user has no country of residence

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user clicks on any game
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN 'Please Log In or Create Account' modal is displayed

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user clicks on 'Log In' cta
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user is taken to 'Log In page'

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN user enters email and password
AND clicks Log In
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user is taken to 'Additional Information page'

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user views the DOB field
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the DOB should be prefilled from user's account
AND DOB should be in MM/DD/YYYY format

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user enters a future birthdate
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user is displayed with “Please enter a correct birthdate” message

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user enters an invalid birthdate (invalid day or month
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user is displayed with “Please enter a correct birthdate” message

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user enters an invalid birthdate (year in YYY format
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user is displayed with: 'Please enter your birthday in the format mm/dd/yyyy' message

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user enters year older than 122 years
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user receives an error message 'Please enter a correct birthdate'

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user enters year younger than 13 years old
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user receives an error message 'You are ineligible to complete registration.'

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user enters a birthdate which is under 21
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN no error message should be displayed

title: Update Account sync
custom_preconds: GIVEN user went though update account flow

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user updated the username
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN new username is reflected under user's account

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user updated DOB to under 21
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN updated DOB is reflected under user's account
AND user is able to play all the games (besides BTS)

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user updated DOB to over 21
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN updated DOB is reflected under user's account
AND user is able to play all the games

title: GameLoop Cookies Unnecessarily Cleared
custom_preconds: Given the app is in the game loop

custom_steps_separated.content:
When I lock the screen and wait for 5 minutes
And I return to the game loop
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the cookies for the webview should not be cleared
And user authentication should remain intact

custom_steps_separated.content: When I background the app
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the cookies should not be cleared
And user authentication should remain intact

custom_steps_separated.content: When I switch between groups and leaderboards in BTS
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the cookies should not be cleared
And user authentication should remain intact

title: Accessibility - screen reader
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user on the home surface
AND user has a screen reader setting on

custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN screen reader reads the page properly

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user is on the gaming hub
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN screen reader reads the page properly

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user is on the browse page
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN screen reader reads the page properly

title: Accessibility - font size
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user on the home surface

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user's font size is set to 150%
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user does not see any visual issues

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user's font size is set to 200%
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user does not see any visual issues

title: PN - user is logged in
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is logged in
AND user played the game 
AND user backgrounded the app
custom_expected: There are no PN for BTN and Pickle games

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN user played the BTS 
and then backgrounded the app
AND BTS results are final
AND user received a PN and clicked on it
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN user is taken to the BTS game 
AND user sees the game results

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN user played the Bingo
and then backgrounded the app
AND Bingo results are final
AND user received a PN and clicked on it
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN user is taken to the Bingo game 
AND user sees the game results

title: PN - user is logged out
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user played the game 
AND then user logged out of the app
AND user backgrounded the app
custom_expected: There are no PN for BTN and Pickle games

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN user played the BTS
AND logged out of the app 
AND then backgrounded the app
AND BTS results are final
AND user received a PN and clicked on it
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user is taken to the login page

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user logs in
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN user is taken to BTS result page
(deeplink still works)

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN user played the Bingo
AND logged out of the app 
AND then backgrounded the app
AND Bingo results are final
AND user received a PN and clicked on it
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user is taken to the login page

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user logs in
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN user is taken to Bingo result page
(deeplink still works)

title: Bingo PN logic
custom_preconds: GIVEN user played Bingo and receives a PN

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user got 0 correct tiles
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the PN wording should be ‘Your Bingo card had 0 correct tiles'

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user got 1 correct tile
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the PN wording should be ‘Your Bingo card had 1 correct tile'

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user got 1multiple correct tiles
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the PN wording should be ‘Your Bingo card had XX correct tiles'

title: Gaming hub - error message

AND user's internet is poor

custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN user sees the error message:

* copy: 'We’re sorry for the inconvenience. Please try reloading the page.'
* 'Reload Page' cta
* 'Troubleshooting' cta

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user clicks on the back button
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user is taken to home page

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user clicks on 'Reload Page' cta
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the page reloads

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user clicks on 'Troubleshooting' cta
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user is taken to https://www.mlb.com/official-information/contact

title: Mobile - Gaming hub -> game card copy

custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the game card copy should not be truncated

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN game card copy is long
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the card height will be adjusted to fit the whole copy
AND the height of the card next to it will be adjusted as well

title: Web - Gaming hub -> game card copy
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user on the games hub

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user views the game card
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the game card copy should not be truncated

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN game card copy is long
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the card height supports three lines of text

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user reduces the screen width
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the game card copy should not be truncated

title: Pickle - iframe
custom_preconds:
GIVEN User A and User B have MLB account
AND both users user the same device

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN logged under User A
AND User A played Pickle
AND User A logs out
AND User B logs in
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN User B is able to play Pickle
AND user B does not see the game results from User A

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN User B logs out
AND User A logs back in
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN User A sees their results
AND User A does not see the game results from User B
